title: Looking for a Support!
body:
Hello there, I am Kairutox, manager of Nesting Blue.

We are looking for a support.

Must have good communication.

Needs to be available straight away.

Must have good knowledge of ADC/Supp synergies.

Must know when to roam and when not to.

--------------------------------

Current Rank:

Highest Rank Achieved:

Top 5 Support Champs:

What do you want from a team:

Please leave your answers in the comments

replies.body:
Current rank - Diamond 5
Highest rank - Diamond 4
Top 5 champs - Karma, Soraka, Lulu, Janna, Annie
What I want from a team - Good communication, Logical thinking
Yea, just let me know whenever you need me
I have sent you a friend request on League.

Current Rank: Silver 4

Highest Rank Achieved: Silver 3

Top 5 Support Champs: Naut,Morg,Ali,Shen,Nami

What do you want from a team: Ive Always wanted to give ranked team a good crack and I have no friends on League and I wanna make friends.
